Package logica

Class Combate

java.lang.Object
logica.Combate
Direct Known Subclasses:
CombatePvE, CombatePvP
public abstract class Combate extends Object
Author:
Pepe y Feli. Clase abstracta que representa un combate entre dos personajes.
